name: Real Apache Missions 3d - Kill the terrorists with your helicopter and shoot tanks and trucks in this battle.
name_original: Real Apache Missions 3d - Kill the terrorists with your helicopter and shoot tanks and trucks in this battle.
description:
The country’s borders and air bases have been shell shocked by an abrupt ambush from enemy troops pouring through the uncharted borders. You are the commander of the anti-terrorist air defense, tasked with leading an excavation mission to lead the air attack on enemy troops and push them out of the occupied bases.


Apache helicopter flight and shooting simulation takes center stage for an epic battle of the aerial bounds. Fighting on in five challenging missions on tough locations, you have to shoot your way through enemy jet fighters, helicopters, armored trucks and tanks. Clear out bases in each area of enemy occupancy to earn bonus rewards and mission points.


GAMEPLAY FEATURES


- Apache helicopter FPS shooting simulator
- Five challenging shooting levels with numerous enemy classes
- Multiple weapons arsenal for shooting
- Fight against land and air enemies troops, in a wave based shooting gameplay

ULTIMATE AIR TO AIR AND GROUND SHOOTING
Get the best experience of fps shooting, air to ground, with multiple weapons at disposal against a variety of enemy. Blast the enemy away with Gatling Guns, short range and guided missiles.
